markdownPage.title: Hello world
markdownPage.description: This is my first written Markdown page that shows the timeline and some additional featuresw about the upcoming project
markdownPage.content:
Hello world

This is my first markdown page and just serves as a temporary playground for me to train and look at

Revival of the Crystal Twin

So after having this amazing day in Gent this friday I got all inspired to make this little wiki. I met with Kristof and the team. Made some wonderful impression and closed of with a beautiful walk through the city center.

I love the idea of what we are going to build here - a digital identity that is going to kick some centralized ass! The technology is already here, now it's time to link everything together and communicate it to the people to create interest and flow.

What am I bringing to the table

I am here to put all my skills and energy together to create a bridge between the technical aspect and the common world. The time is now to enliven the Crystal Twin to it's full potential. This needs to be communicated in a interesting and fun way to investors and to developers.

It is so important that people get back there digital sovereignity. This project will give them their digital freedom back.

Some specifics for the first steps:

  • I will be investigating
  • I will make the project tangible
  • I will start with creating two wiki's that explains this in detail
  • I will know in detail what is already build on the grid
  • I will know what is needed to get this build
  • I will get familiar with using the grid and explaining this to others
  • I will think and create an outline of the protocol that is needed to make this all possible
  • I will be in co-creation with the different teams to make this all possible.

First month timeline

Here you can see the outline of the first month:

Extra remarks

Check the app telegram for more info about this project
